title: We are a bunch of researchers who decided to help small and medium businesses
text: Large companies take advantage of AI tools to enhance their teams with inhouse builders, we aim to provide the same services for smaller businesses who could benefit from this technology but do not have the budget or the employees to do it.

section.title: Why PalmAI?
section.content: We create custom software for your business and we aim to match and beat the price of any of out competitors without sacrificing the quality of our models
